overview:
Archana is the Co-Founder and CEO of Hmmm, a personal life-streaming app that lets you present yourself online, just like in real life.

Prior to Hmmm, she co-founded MyCityWay, a urban navigation platform that specializes in building real-time Mega Utility Apps for navigating with ease in the Urban scene.

Archana graduated from the PSG College of Technology with a Bachelor degree in Computer Science. Since graduating, Archana has worked for companies such as S&P, JPMorgan Chase and Citi Group as a Lead Front End Web Specialist. Archana’s programming skills are extensive, and include an understanding of the latest technologies such as Ajax, EXT JS, jQuery, php, Objective C etc.
